|flags = Bluetooth 4.0 |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/25/2013 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0156DVQ7G |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "WCBN802B" and "323C300570YD" appears to be silkscreened on these cards. :This module would appear to be using an NGFF 2230 (M.2) interface. *'''Lite-On WCBN802B''' ([http://i57.fastpic.ru/big/2014/0313/b0/f7d97e68dc41ea307297c3c75eeac1b0.jpg image]) :Broadcom Model: BCM94352Z :MAC ID: 24FD52B69F55 :BD ID: 24FD528DE583 :WCBN802B 323C300570YD :200-125304-0020_01 :S/N: 802BMOWWIDIC35000159 :G86C0006H710 CS1 Sample See also [[Foxconn T77H543.00]] (Lenovo) .. ==Links of Interest== ===Forum threads=== *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:60603 On '''iXBT'''] :Broadcom BCM4352 - 2T2R 802.11ac :Broadcom BCM20702 - Bluetooth 4.0 *[http://www.tonymacx86.com/network/104850-guide-airport-pcie-half-mini-v2-76.html List of PCIe / NGFF devices @ '''tonymacx86'''] :BCM94352Z - 802.11ac Wireless Network Adapter :Vendor ID = 14e4, Device ID = 43b1 :Bluetooth - BCM20702A1 :Product ID = 0x200b, Vendor ID = 0x04ca
